root.name: ArmA: Cold War Assault
root.description: IntroductionArmA: Cold War Assault is Bohemia Interactive's debut game. Originally released by Codemasters as Operation Flashpoint in 2001, the game was recently re-branded and re-released to bring it in line with Bohemia's ArmA franchise. Owners of the original Operation Flashpoint can download a free patch to bring their game up to date. It's also available on Steam.Story"The horrors of WWIII are imminent. There are clashes over the Malden Islands from dusk to dawn and you are caught in-between. You must use all of the available resources in your arsenal to hold back the incoming darkness. Victor Troska came back to Nogovo, he thought the pain of war was left buried in his past. But his dream lies broken now. His worst nightmare returns when military forces lands near Nogovo."From the official website.System RequirementsMinimumOS: Windows XP or Windows VistaProcessor: Intel Dual-core 2.4GHz or AMD Dual-core Athlon 2.5GHzMemory: 1GB RAMGraphics: Nvidia Geforce 8600GT or ATI Radeon 3650 or fasterDirectXÂ®: DirectX 9.0cHard Drive: 1GB free spaceSound: OpenAL sound compatible audiocard
